channel.title: blogdown on ThreeFeetDeep
channel.description: Recent content in blogdown on ThreeFeetDeep

item.title: R markdown in hugo and blogdown
item.description: R Markdown Throughout my ongoing journey of discovery and learning in statistics and data science , my mainstay computing environment has been the R Studio IDE. I found initially that it is quite hard to include R markdown output in blogging sites like WordPress. This led me to create my own website from scratch (in simple HTML,CSS and JavaScript) but this rapidly become cumbersome to maintain, even as a static site.
